posts.post_title: T207 for sale -- new to hobby -- reduced before eBay
posts.post_content:
T207 cards below range from GD to VG+. All cards have Recruit backs, and all cards are new to the hobby. Email for larger scans or with any questions. First person to indicate “I’ll take it” will secure a card/cards. Check / m.o. or paypal gift preferred. I will cover shipping. Thanks for looking,

Andrew

[quote name="MartyFromCANADA" post=1373730]$20 for the Graney?[/QUOTE]

You need to check the date on the threads before you respond. There is a great chance that a 6 month old sale is not still active. It is probably better to PM the member but posting is fine too. I wouldn't get my hopes up too high though on this old of a thread.

Yeah, got to open my eyes. And your right, probably better idea to try and make a deal in PM. Thanks, Marty
